contact.message-sent: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Presentation.line1: I'm a Mexican Full Stack Developer based in Finland since September 2014.
Presentation.line2: I began my Communication Engineering studies in Spain and moved to Finland in 2014 as an Erasmus exchange student at Aalto University.

skills.info-click: Click the logo to see the certificate

strengths.line1_1: These strengths were crucial in successfully completing the
strengths.line1_3: , equipping me with the skills for a career in web/software development. Throughout this challenging program, I consistently delivered strong results, even when facing completely new technologies, demonstrating patience, dedication, and a strong work ethic.
strengths.line2: Leveraging extensive prior experience, I excel at empathetic and approachable communication, ensuring clear understanding of client needs.
strengths.line3: My experience as a drum teacher developed my ability to explain complex concepts and techniques simply. This skill is invaluable for clearly articulating services and functionalities to clients in the tech industry.

education.line11: Introductory course covering Kubernetes (K3s, GKE) and CI/CD for deploying and managing applications, developed by University of Helsinki in partnership with Unity.
education.line9: Introductory course on containerization using Docker and Docker Compose for efficient application deployment, developed by University of Helsinki in partnership with Eficode.
education.line7: Comprehensive program (AUG 2020 - JULY 2021) from the University of Helsinki, covering modern web development: JavaScript, React, Node.js (RESTful/GraphQL), TypeScript, React Native, and Continuous Integration. In cooperation with Houston Inc, Terveystalo, Elisa, K-ryhmä, Unity Technologies, and Konecranes.
education.line6: M.Sc. Master Courses in Communication Engineering
education.line1: @Universidad Politecnica de Cartagena - Technical School of Telecommunications Engineering

experience.responsabilities4:
Supported clients in maintaining and updating applications/websites, ensuring optimal functionality and client satisfaction.
Gained hands-on experience and developed skills across multiple technologies including AWS (Lambda, DynamoDB, Route53, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, CloudFront), Docker, Kubernetes (GKE), Google Cloud, Auth0, Datadog, Helm, Istio, and Terraform.
Contributed to diverse client projects, specifically for Eltel Networks (Resource Management environment), Veikkaus Oy (network, proxy, and reliability solutions), and Spinverse (Funding search engine environment).
Utilized a robust tech stack including React, Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, MobX, Express, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Git, Bitbucket, GitLab, REST, Eslint, Prettier, SCSS, and Java.
experience.responsabilities3:
Provided comprehensive breakfast, lunch, dinner, and room service, consistently ensuring positive guest experiences.
Managed diverse guest needs and preferences in a high-end hospitality environment.
experience.responsabilities2:
Performed varied roles including waiter supervisor, cook, and dishwasher.
Developed strong communication and customer service skills through direct interaction and understanding of customer needs.
experience.company1: Various Bars, Restaurants, Concerts & Music Shops
experience.responsabilities1:
Worked as a professional drummer, leading and performing in several bands.
Taught drums part-time, developing skills in simplifying complex concepts and adapting teaching methods to individual learning styles.

hero.headline: Freelance Full Stack Development
hero.subheadline: Your vision, my code. From simple websites to robust infrastructure.

simple_sites.title: Simple Websites & One-Pagers
simple_sites.description: Quickly launch your online presence with a professional, responsive single-page website or a dynamic landing page tailored to your needs.

full_stack_apps.title: Custom Full Stack Applications
full_stack_apps.description: Building robust, scalable, and secure web applications with custom backends, databases, and integrated cloud infrastructure.

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud Solutions
devops.description: Designing and managing resilient cloud infrastructure. Expertise in Docker, Kubernetes, and platforms like GCP and AWS for seamless deployment.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Optimization
maintenance.description: Providing ongoing support, bug fixes, and performance tuning to keep your existing applications running smoothly and efficiently.

discovery.title: Discovery & Planning
discovery.description: We start with a conversation to understand your goals, vision, and technical requirements. This leads to a clear project roadmap.

development.title: Development & Iteration
development.description: Through agile development, I build your project, providing regular updates and incorporating your feedback to ensure it meets your expectations.

deployment.title: Deployment & Launch
deployment.description: I handle the seamless deployment of your application to the cloud, ensuring it is secure, scalable, and ready for users.

support.title: Support & Maintenance
support.description: Post-launch, I am available for ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your application remains a reliable and high-performing solution.

cta.headline: Ready to bring your idea to life?
cta.subheadline: Let's discuss your project and turn your vision into reality.
